page.title: 09Law & Order in Bognor Regis
page.content: The figures for 1984 reported crimes are 1,763. The main crime in Bognor is theft. 1,763 thefts were reported in Bognor. That is,perhaps,only half of the thefts that have taken place. There are 77 policemen and 14 special constables. In the winter the population in Bognor is 50,000.In the summer (May to Sept)it is 10,000. Bognor has 3 squad cars and 2 motor cycles. Bognor police cover 14 square miles.P.C.Pearson said that crimes are increasing while the number of police is being reduced.Crime Figs. 1984: cycle theft 193/theft from vehicles 261/shoplifting 559/theft from motors 116/car thefts 122/other thefts 412/criminal damage 159/burglaries 465/assaults 110. Record of all people convicted for crime in Sussex are kept in the Sussex criminal information system.
